body.name: WLIVE Nightstand Set of 2, 2 Drawer Dresser for Bedroom, Small Dresser with 2 Drawers, Bedside Furniture, Night Stand, End Table for Bedroom, College Dorm, Rustic Brown Wood Grain Print
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 23 hrs
features: MULTIPURPOSE: This lightweight nightstand is ideal for bedroom, college dorm, living room, office and more. It can be a night stand for bedroom, a convenient end table by sofa or a toy organizer.

SPACIOUS STORAGE: The 2 fabric drawers of the small dresser offer large storage space for nighttime necessities. The wood top is ideal to place alarm clock, phone, charger, eyeglasses, keeping them in your reach.

STURDY & DURABLE: The nightstand has strong steel frame and water-resistant wooden top to ensure a long service time, easy pull handles to make opening and closing smooth, and 4 adjustable plastic feet to protect floor from scratches.

STYLISH DESIGN: The simple and modish design of the bedside furniture matches perfectly with any furnishing style. You can find more fabric dressers of the same collection from WLIVE and make your purchase a bundle.
EASY ASSEMBLY: The bedside table can be assembled in 15 minutes with the instructions and tools included in the package. The overall dimensions of the 2 drawer dresser: 15.7" L x 11.8" W x 20.9" H.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Would buy again.
reviews.reviewText: I got the smaller version of this night table, so it was a bit smaller than i thought, but that's on me. In any case, it is a great product. For the price point, it is of good quality, and very easy to put together. I think that if you're looking for a nicely priced bedside table, this is it. Lightweight, cute, quality and easy to build product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nightsand that Strikes Elegance for Small Spaces
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. The WLIVE Nightstand, a 2-Drawer Dresser designed for small bedrooms. After putting it to the test, here's my take on this compact piece of furniture.Pros:+Effortless Assembly: The assembly process was a breeze and took me a maximum of 20 minutes. For those who prioritize swift setup, this is a definite win.+Complete Kit: The package includes all the tools and hardware needed for assembly, with the thoughtful addition of one extra screw for each type. This attention to detail ensures you won't be left stranded if a piece goes missing or is defective.+Sleek Design: The WLIVE Nightstand boasts a clean and modern design that seamlessly fits into small rooms. Take a look at the pictures, and you'll see how well it complements various aesthetics.+Space Efficiency: Tailored for compact spaces, this dresser maximizes functionality without compromising style. It's a great addition for those looking to optimize space without sacrificing aesthetics.+Smooth Drawer Operation: The drawers are a standout feature, gliding effortlessly and fitting snugly into place. This contributes to a hassle-free user experience and adds to the overall satisfaction with the product.Cons:-Sturdiness: While not as sturdy as some higher-priced alternatives, the WLIVE Nightstand holds its ground considering its affordability. For the price, the compromise in sturdiness is a reasonable trade-off.In summary, the WLIVE Nightstand is a fantastic option for those seeking an easy-to-assemble, stylish solution for small bedrooms. Its sleek design, efficient use of space, and smooth drawer operation make it a worthy addition to any space-conscious individual's bedroom. If you're willing to compromise a bit on sturdiness in exchange for a budget-friendly, aesthetically pleasing nightstand, the WLIVE 2-Drawer Dresser is certainly worth considering.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for what you pay for it
reviews.reviewText: For what you pay for these night stands, they're great. I got two of these for a little less than the price of one of the night stands they were replacing. Let's go through the pros and cons.Pros:They look nice! They're true to color from the pictures. I got dark wood and grey drawers and I have no complains about how they look.They're very affordable. The IKEA one's I had before were going for 80$ a pop now. These are a great value for the price.Light-weight. Makes them easy to move if needed.Drawers come all the way out without any fiddling.Super easy to assemble.Shallow so good for tight spaces but big enough top for an alarm clock, chargers etcBIG drawers. You can put a ton in these bad boysCons:Light weight. These things are so light that they wobble on carpet and can be knocked around/over if you don't fill the drawers.The drawers come out without any fiddling. This can be a bonus but if you're not intending to remove the drawers, there's nothing stopping them form coming all the way out and spilling all their contents.Shallow. The dimensions can be good for tight spaces, and the width is great. I wish they were a bit longer, though. You either have to put them far away from the wall and have an awkward gap, or have them closer to the wall and then they're sitting behind the pillow.All in all, I'd say they're pretty good. A little more weight to it would be mice but not really a problem. Same with the depth. Looks good, functions great, and great quality for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install
reviews.reviewText: Easy to set up. set these up for our nightstands. Overall structure is sturdy. The drawers are like thick cloth material, so not super sturdy but holds smaller, lightweight things.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice for the price.
reviews.reviewText: Bought 2 for the bedroom. (His and hers).... We love them. Easy to put together. Very sturdy. Drawers are a little bigger then a labtop. Holds alot! We have books in the bottom drawer. It hold up well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice looking, but screws are a nightmare!
reviews.reviewText: I love the look of the finished product and I'm going to assume it's going to hold my bathing suits just fine. But I thought I was going to pull my damn hair out trying to get the side rails fastened to the top board. There are 8 total screws to be used for this section. I got 5 of the 8 successfully before I threw in the towel! And I have small fingers. I couldn't imagine what that would be like with bigger fingers!! 🤬 The screws just would not go into the plastic threaded hole. I was cussin'!🤣😳I am thankful for the easy directions though. But for the love of tools, when it comes to the handles, USE YOUR OWN PHILLIPS SCREWDRIVER!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect size for small space
reviews.reviewText: Easy to assemble and perfect as a nightstand in our guest room. Made to store light items, but still sturdy enough to put heavier items on top.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small and cute
reviews.reviewText: I plan to move sometime in the next year so I was looking for something lightweight that won't be a pain to move in the future. This is great. It's a bit short, but it works for what I need it for. I have some items like chapstik, books, notebooks, etc. that I like to keep nearby my bed, and this has plenty of space with two drawers for everything. I have most of my stuff in the top drawer and my cat has decided she likes the bottom drawer lol. It was super easy to assemble and took maybe 15 minutes at most to put together. I would highly recommend this if you have a small space or just want something light and quick you can put together.
